author: rgodfrey
msg: NO-JIRA : [Java config] small changes to the management servlet

author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3768: ClassCastException when running some Durable Consumer test cases. root cause of the classcast was the reuse of a freed node that was still referenced as the head page id of a listindex. The fix is to not modify the head page id of a listindex when removing and coalescing linked pages, the head page remains valid for the duration of a subscription. Eventually got a test case that could easlily reproduce

author: dweiss
msg: LUCENE-3847: ignore user.timezone because it is set by java logging system and this is hard to predict.
